description: Tornado powered MTA for accepting all incoming emails without any disk IO, although no messages actually ever get delivered. Mainly for testing huge send rates, for making sure developers dont accidentally send emails to real users, email integration testing and things like that.
longdescription: Tornado powered MTA for accepting all incoming emails without any disk IO, although no messages actually ever get delivered. Mainly for testing huge send rates, for making sure developers dont accidentally send emails to real users, email integration testing and things like that.
